cause.description:
Gangs bring violence, vandalism, and other illegal activities to neighborhoods, shattering residents' sense of safety. Gang membership can be devastating to a young person's future. Gang crime, however, is preventable through education and community outreach.
1. Crime Prevention is efficient
2. Gang crime is preventable
cause.mission: To prevent youth from joining gangs through prevention education.
cause.name: Prevent Gangs
